span.breadcrumb_last,.tourbrd span,.tour-overview p, .tour-collection p,ul.highlight-this-tour li,.TourDates p,.pkg-inc ul li, .pkg-exc ul li,.tour-overview p b,h2.tourDBox,.sidebar_section_col ul li a {
    font-family: 'Roboto';
}

.TourDates p {
    font-size: 16px;
}

ul.highlight-this-tour li:before {
    content: "\f191";
    font: normal 14px/1 FontAwesome;
    color: #444;
    display: inline-block !important;
    width: 1em;
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0 5px 0 0;
    text-align: center;
    font-variant: normal;
    text-transform: none;
    line-height: 1em;
    position: relative;
}
h2.tourDBox {
    font-weight: bold;
}
.TourList {
    border-left: dashed 1px #d8d8d8;
    border-radius: 0px;
    float: left;
    width: 100%;
    position: relative;
}
.TourDates:first-child {
    margin-top: 0;
    padding-top: 0;
}
.TourDates {
    margin: 15px 0 15px 0px;
    padding-top: 10px;
    margin-left: 20px;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #d8d8d8;
    font-size: 16px;
    cursor: pointer;
    display: block;
    color: #1F2225;
    float: left;
    width: 98%;
}
.TourDay_details {
    float: left;
    width: 85%;
    letter-spacing: 0.5px;
    word-spacing: 0.8px;
    line-height: normal;
    font-size: 14px;
}
.TourDay {
    color: #c00100;
    margin-right: 10px;
    float: left;
}
.expBut {
    width: 26px;
    text-align: center;
    color: #061b30;
    height: 28px;
    line-height: 23px;
    float: right;
    margin-left: 5px;
    margin-bottom: 6px;
    cursor: pointer;
    text-align: center;
    font-weight: bold;
    float: right;
    font-size: 22px;
    padding: 0 4px;
    border-radius: 21px;
}
.TourList .TourInfo {
    margin-left: 0;
    padding: 0 0px 20px 20px;
    background-color: white;
    overflow: hidden;
}
.tour-overview p, .tour-collection p {
    text-align: justify;
}
.TourList::after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    width: 18px;
    height: 18px;
    left: -11px;
    background-color: white;
    border: 2px solid #061b30;
    top: 0px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    z-index: 1;
}
.tour-collection {
    float: left;
    width: 100%;
}

.sidebar_section_col, .sidebar_section_col2 {
    margin: 0 0 15px 0;
    background: #fff;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0 1px 5px 0 rgb(0 0 0 / 30%);
    box-shadow: 0 1px 5px 0 rgb(0 0 0 / 30%);
    margin-top: 20px;
}

    font-size: 20px;
    color: #fff;
    background: #061b30;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 10px;
    font-family: 'Roboto';
    font-weight: bold;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li a {

    padding: 6px 10px;
    display: block;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-size: 16px;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li i {

}

}

    text-align: right;
    font-weight: bold;
}

.sidebar_section_col ul li:before {
    display: none;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0px;
    list-style: none;
    border-bottom: 1px dotted #d8d7d4;
}

.TourDates p {
    font-weight: bold;
}

.tourbrd a {
    color: #bf000c;
    font-weight: bold;
}
.tour-collection .table-responsive {
    min-height: .01%;

}
.tour-collection table {
    width: 100%;

}
.tour-collection .table-newbg table tr {
    background-color: #fef2b8;

}
.tour-collection .table-newbg table th {

}

}

<div class="cmsmasters_column one_first">
<div class="custom_html">
<div class="tourbrd">
<h1>Special Honeymoon in Switzerland Tour Package</h1>
<p><span><a href="/" title="Home">Home</a> » <a href="/international-tours" title="International Tour Packages">International</a> » <a href="/holidays-in-switzerland" title="Switzerland Tour Packages">Switzerland</a> » <span class="breadcrumb_last" aria-current="page">Switzerland Honeymoon Tour Package</span></span></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="cmsmasters_row_673c3d3c5dd3b9_58014561" class="cmsmasters_row cmsmasters_color_scheme_default tourflexBox cmsmasters_row_top_default cmsmasters_row_bot_default cmsmasters_row_boxed">
<div id="tourflexBox2" class="cmsmasters_row_outer_parent">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_outer">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_inner">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_margin">
<div class="cmsmasters_column two_third">
<div class="custom_html tourIB1">
<div class="proGall"><img decoding="async" src="/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/switzerland-honeymoon.jpg" alt="Special Honeymoon in Switzerland Tour" title="Special Honeymoon in Switzerland Tour" width="750" height="450" loading="lazy"></div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB2">
<div class="tour-overview">
<div class="toBt"><i class="fa fa-file"></i> Tour Overview</div>
<p>Switzerland is famous all over the world for its incredibly stunning and picturesque surroundings, snow-capped mountain peaks, blue clear water bodies and overall a romantic environment. Book your special honeymoon in Switzerland tour packages and kick start your wedding at a positive and relaxed note. Taking a stroll down the breath-taking pathways and spending some time gazing at the surreal landscape here will be something that you will not be able to experience anywhere else in the world. Avail the offer now and ensure that you and your better half get the honeymoon you deserve.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB4">
<div class="tour-collection">
<h2 class="tourDBox"><i class="fa fa-bus" aria-hidden="true"></i> Switzerland Honeymoon Tour Itinerary Package</h2>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details" id="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 1 :</span>Arrival in Milan – Varese</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="">
<p>You will be boarding the flight headed for Milan. Upon your arrival at the airport, our tour representative will be transferred to Varese which is situated at a distance of around more than 1 hour from Milan. On arrival, you will be checked in to your allotted here for an overnight stay.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 2 :</span>Varese – Zurich – Engelberg</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>After having a delicious breakfast in the morning you will be made to proceed to your next destination in Engelberg. This will be a road journey of 2 hours and 45 minutes. En route, you will be made to visit the pristine lakes of Lugano and Zurich. The drive will be very scenic and memorable. On arriving here you will be made to check in to your hotel where you will be spending the night. If there is time you will be taken for a visit to the Rhine waterfalls in Schaffhausen where you can even enjoy a fun boat ride.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 3 :</span>Engelberg – Mt. Titlis – Engelberg</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>After your breakfast in the morning, you will be taken for a more exciting and fun part of your honeymoon Switzerland tour. You will be taken for a ride on the world’s 1st revolving cable car ride to Mt. Titlis. From here you can gaze at some of the most breathtaking and awe-inspiring views of the surrounding snow-capped peaks. Along with snow sliding and ice flyer ride, you will be experiencing a fun time here. You can even be taken on a sightseeing visit of Lucerne. After this, you will be taken back to your hotel in Engelberg for staying the night.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 4 :</span>Engelberg – Jungfraujoch – Interlaken</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>After having your breakfast in the morning you will be made to proceed at your next destination of Interlaken which is situated at a distance of 1 hour and 30 minutes of road journey. En route you will be visiting the glacial waterfall of Trummelbach and have an adventurous experience at the top of Europe in Jungfraujoch mountains via a cogwheel train ride. On reaching Interlaken you will be made to check in to your hotel here for an overnight stay.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 5 :</span>Interlaken – Bern – Broc – Villars</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>After having your breakfast in the morning you will be made to proceed for your next destination of Villars which will require you to cover an awe-inspiring journey distance of 2 hours. En route you will be made to visit some of the top destinations of tourist attractions in Bern and Broc where you will be covering interesting places like Bear pits, clock tower, old town, Einstein house, Aare River etc. on reaching Villars you will be checked in to your allotted hotel here for an overnight stay.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 6 :</span>Villars – Vevey – Geneva</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>After having your breakfast in the morning you will be made to visit the famous Chaplin’s world in Vevey which will fall en route your way to Geneva. This is located at a distance of around 2 hours. On reaching Geneva you will be taken for a visit to some of the most popular tourist attractions here like Jet D’eau fountain, famous broken chair, Geneva Lake, Red Cross and WHO building and others. You will be going for the complete sightseeing tour of Geneva the whole day. After this you will be checked in to your allotted hotel here for staying the night.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 7 :</span>Geneva – Titisee – Zurich Departure</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Early in the morning after having your breakfast you will be made to visit the famous cuckoo clock factory at Drubba Titisee. After this unique attraction, you will be made to head for your final destination in Zurich which will be a journey of almost 1.5 hours from Titisee. Finally on reaching you will be made to head on for your departure location from where you will board the flight heading for your desired destination.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="custom_html tourIB3">
<div class="tour-collection">
<h3><i class="cmsmasters-icon-flight" aria-hidden="true"></i> Trip Highlights</h3>
<ul class="highlight-this-tour">
<li>Visit to the pristine lakes of Lugano and Zurich</li>
<li>Experience the thrilling ride to Mt. Titlis on the world's first revolving cable car</li>
<li>Visit the glacial waterfall of Trummelbach and have an adventurous experience at the top of Europe on a cogwheel train ride in the Jungfraujoch mountains</li>
<li>Explore the Bern and Broc where you will be covering interesting places like Bear pits, clock tower, old town, Einstein house, Aare River etc.</li>
<li>Also be a part of the Red Cross and WHO building</li>
<li>Explore the rich taste of Swiss chocolates and cheese too</li>
</ul></div>
</div>

<div class="custom_html tourIB8">
<div id="popularBox8" class="tour-collection">
<h3><i class="fa fa-question-circle" aria-hidden="true"></i> FAQs for Switzerland Honeymoon Package</h3>
<div class="panel-body">
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> Why Is Switzerland Ideal For A Honeymoon?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> You can have a fantastic and romantic vacation with Switzerland Honeymoon. There are also numerous breathtaking sights. Zurich's beauty is enhanced by its charming streets, breathtaking waterfront promenades, snow-capped mountains, and breathtaking views of Lake Geneva and its coastlines.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> Why Is Switzerland Romantic?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Dine-in and enjoy the beautiful artistic interiors of Zurich and Geneva, among other romantic experiences available in Switzerland. Aside from that, one can enjoy world-class skiing and hiking in the beautiful and untouched Swiss Alps.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> Why Are Indians So Fond Of Switzerland?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Switzerland appeals to Indians due to its history of cultural exchange as well as its perception as an orderly, tidy society free of the messy complications that plague daily life on the Subcontinent.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Kind Of Food Is Available In Switzerland?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> In general, basic food items include a wide variety of bread (white, whole wheat, and so on), dairy products such as milk, yoghurt, butter, and - of course - a wide variety of the world-famous Swiss cheese. Vegetables such as beans, carrots, cauliflower, potatoes, spinach, and so on are also important.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> When Are Meals Served In Switzerland?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Lunch is typically served between noon and 2 p.m., though some restaurants serve it earlier. Dinner is typically served between 6 and 9.30 p.m. Many restaurants and pubs, particularly in cities, also serve hot dishes all day (11 a.m. to 10 p.m.)</p>
</p></div></div></div></div></div>
</div>
</div>

		</p>
		<p><span class="wpcf7-form-control-wrap" data-name="your-date"><input size="40" maxlength="400" class="wpcf7-form-control wpcf7-text wpcf7-validates-as-required" aria-required="true" aria-invalid="false" placeholder="Time of Travel*" value="" type="text" name="your-date" /></span><span class="wpcf7-form-control-wrap" data-name="your-trMess"><textarea cols="40" rows="10" maxlength="140" class="wpcf7-form-control wpcf7-textarea" aria-invalid="false" placeholder="Write a description of your tour so we can design the best package for you!" name="your-trMess"></textarea></span>
		</p>
		<div>
			<p><button type="submit" class="waves-bxt submitBtn2">SEND ME DETAILS <i class="fa fa-arrow-circle-right"></i></button><br />
<span class="infoBxs">We never share your Information.</span>
			</p>
		</div>
	</div>
</div><div class="wpcf7-response-output" aria-hidden="true"></div>
</form>
</div>
</div>

excerpt.rendered: Special Honeymoon in Switzerland Tour Package Home » International » Switzerland » Switzerland Honeymoon Tour Package Tour Overview Switzerland is famous all over the world for its incredibly stunning and picturesque surroundings, snow-capped mountain peaks, blue clear water bodies and overall a romantic environment. Book your special honeymoon in Switzerland tour packages and kick start...
